1.text: These the generations of the sons of Noah; Shem, Ham, and Japheth. And sons shall be born to them after the flood.

2.text: The sons of Japheth; Gomer and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, and Tubal, and Meshech, and Tiras.

3.text: And the sons of Gomer; Ashkenaz, and Riphath, and Togarmah.

4.text: And the sons of Javan; Elishah, and Tarshish, Chittim and Dodanirn.

5.text: By these were the isles of the nations divided in their lands; a man according to his tongue, according to their tribe, in their nations.

6.text: And the sons of Ham; Cush, and Mizraim, and Phut, and Canaan.

7.text: And the sons of Cush; Seba, and Havilah, and Sabtah, and Raamah, and Sabtecha; and the sons of Raamah; Sheba and Dedan.

8.text: And Cush begat Nimrod: he began to be strong in the earth.

9.text: He was a strong taker of prey before the face of Jehovah; for this he will say, As Nimrod the strong hunter before the face of Jehovah.

10.text: And the beginning of his kingdom shall be Babel, and Erech, and Accad, and Calneh, in the land of Shinar.

11.text: From that land shall come forth Asshur, and shall build Nineveh, and the city Reheboth, and Calah,

12.text: And Resen between Nineveh and Calah: this a great city.

13.text: And Mizraim begat Ludim, and Anamim, and Lehabim, and Naphtuhim.

14.text: And Pathrusim, and Casluhim, (which from the same came Philistine) and Caphtorim.

15.text: And Caanan will beget Sidon, his first-born, and Heth,

16.text: And the Jebusite, and the Amorite, and the Girgasite,

17.text: And the Hivite, and the Arkite, and the Sinite,

18.text: And the Arvadite, and the Zemarite, and the Hamathite: and afterward the families of the Canaanites were dispersed.

19.text: And the bound of the Canaanite shall be from Sidon in thy coming to Gerar, to Azzah; in thy coming to Sodom and Gomorrah, and Admah, and Zeboim, even to Lasha.

20.text: These the sons of Hain according to their families, according to their tongues, in their lands, in their nations.

21.text: And to Shem shall be born, even to him the father of all the sons of Eber, the brother of Japheth the great.

22.text: The sons of Shem: Elam, and Asshur, and Arphaeshad, and Lud, and Aram.

23.text: And the sons of Aram: Uz, and Hul, and Gether, and Mash.

24.text: And Arphaeshad shall beget Shelah, and Shelah shall beget Eber.

25.text: And to Eber shall be born two sons: the name of the latter, Peleg, for in his days the earth was divided; and the name of his brother, Joktan.

26.text: And Joktan will beget Ahnodad, and Sheleph, and Hazarmaveth, and Jerah,

27.text: And Hadoram, and Uzal, and Diklah,

28.text: And Obal, and Abimael, and Sheba,

29.text: And Ophir, and Havilah, and Jobab: all these the sons of Joktan.

30.text: And their dwelling shall be from Mesha, in thy going to Sephar, a mountain of the east.

31.text: These the sons of Shem, according to their families, according to their tongues, in their lands, according to their nations.

32.text: These the families of Noah after their generations, in their nations and by these were the nations divided in the earth after the flood.
